Coming back to give an actual review. I purchased this game when it still cost money to be able to play. I fell in love quickly and went straight to comp. This game was literally my life during high school. I have to say it's a really fun game and bringing friends into it makes it better! Although I don't agree that the game should be free, because now it gives hackers advantages to make more and more accounts every time they get banned. Other than that, the game is a definite must try for your first fps that's not Call Of Duty.
Great game, friendly players. The only issue is the hackers but that happens in every game.
it good game. me recommend. CSGO have sum fun with ur friends :)
